title: Monofilament Fiber
text:
##Diameter: <2nm average
 - Handle with care -
 @! RISK OF DEATH !@
 Monofiber will effortlessly cut through limbs and equipment in an instant!
 ALWAYS wear protective clothing!
 Do not touch Monofiber without proper protective gear!
 Only handle in brightly lit places!

title: Alina's Diary (3)
text:
It's worse than I thought. Everyone has disappeared.
 I still haven't found any trace of Elster... it's as if she had never been here.
 Something's wrong with the Protektors - those that are still around.
 A guard spotted me earlier sneaking out of the Medical Wing, and she let out a monstrous scream as she chased after me.
 When I looked back, I saw her face, and now I can't forget.
 It looked like she'd been in some horrible accident...

title: The Twin Suns
text:
along the shore the cloud waves break,
 the twin suns sink $behind the lake,$
 the shadows lengthen

title: Black Stars
text:
$Strange is$ the night where black stars rise,
 and strange moons circle through the skies
 but stranger still

title: Tears Unshed
Sorts of Death
text:
For there be $divers s$orts of death - some wherein the body rem$aineth; and
 in$ some it vanisheth quite away with the spirit.

title: Sorts of Death (2)
text:
$i$n one kind of death the spirit also die$th, and this it hath been
 known to do$ while yet the body was in vigour for many years. Sometimes, $as is veritably attested,$ it dieth with the body, but $after a season$ is raised up again $in that place$ where the body did decay

title: And a Star Fell
text:
and a $great burning$ star fell $from th$e sky,
 and a mounta$in fe$ll into the sea an$d the water$ turned to blood, $and th$ e
 moon $and stars and sun$ turned dark

title: A Sea of Flesh
text:
##it calls me
 in a sea of flesh
 we will become one
 but i can never go back
 to being me
